name: Incredible Tips
description: Makes the loading screen tips significantly better.

english.304739915: When you see text in red saying 'Non-Target Killed', it means you're playing the game correctly.
english.4179512648: Save scumming is not only morally OK but in fact preferable according to an actual loading screen tip.
english.3938743496: Mission Story guides are a very useful feature and definitely don't hold your hand excessively.
english.1907777187: Missed an elusive target? Guards saw you and you died? Skill issue
english.942089933: Play each mission several times in order to unlock new items. This will definitely not get old after some time.
english.2112989653: Stashed items, dropped disguises and mission objectives are shown on the map - only the best agents need to consult a map to find where their target is.
english.1484493702: Ever looked at the Career page? Me neither
english.3989129882: Escalations are a fun way to replay the game and definitely do not become stale.
english.3771288163: When you're creating a contract, remember to make it fun.
english.1075550078: Ever looked at the Intel section? Me neither
english.3550947723: If an NPC sees you commit a crime, make that NPC the victim of a crime.
english.948998792: If a guard sees a gun lying on the ground, they will spend the next thirty minutes putting it away somewhere.
english.3612539318: If a guard sees an explosive, they'll try to disarm it. Take one of the various explosives that are non-suspicious instead; they are strictly better.
english.898556623: If you hold CTRL, you can magically see through walls. This is because of cloning or some shit.
english.3662449137: Most items can be dropped, placed, or thrown directly at the nearest person's head.
english.830157554: Holstering your weapon has no effect on NPC reactions beyond the occasional remark.
english.3736689100: Guards are pretty good at frisking. Except for all the items that are undetectable.
english.800195137: NPCs are greedy pieces of shit who will steal any money you leave lying around.
english.3228592511: If you stab an NPC, they will die.
english.2777097396: If you give an NPC emetic poison, they will vomit in the nearest bathroom (or maybe bin).
english.1246056330: NPCs have the magical ability to tell if someone is sleeping or the victim of the crime.
english.2708665481: If someone sees you but you knock them out, they can still remember you. They likely will for the rest of their lives, depending on exactly what they saw.
english.1320198071: Guards have an infinite supply of body bags in their pockets.
english.2892793038: You can take the clothes of someone in a box, but not kill them. Curious
english.1135538160: Shoot every chandelier you see. It's funny.
english.2828621043: Don't shoot an oil puddle if you're standing in it.
english.1197162445: Breaking doors open with a crowbar is cool and definitely legal.
english.1719230920: Cornelia Stuyvesant! Oh you're here! How wonderful!
english.1502744446: Guards are legally allowed to carry assault weapons. Not sniper rifles though. That's weird.
english.1678375796: Getting into gunfights is cool and epic.
english.2345373770: Some sniper rifles are good. The Bartoli Woodsman hunting rifle is not.
english.1627138889: Placing explosives is suspicious. In fact, one might assume that a person seen placing explosives is an imposter.
english.2403221623: The yellow warning triangle on an action means that you should do it with everyone watching. Try it!
english.2580601491: Location mastery is a fun mechanic and is not excessively repetitive when looking for a specific item.
english.2183147568: Starting locations can be used to start in a different location.
english.1763150643: Agency pickups can be used to pick up items from the agency.
english.2262163469: You can fit two corpses in a dumpster. This was experimentally tested by IO Interactive themselves.
english.2011085696: When Hunted, find the nearest box and wait there for about 10 minutes. They'll forget all about the mass murderer on the loose.
english.2552025278: Everyone in HITMAN is incredibly stupid. Wear a new disguise and they'll have no idea who you are.
english.1295183607: If someone hears a gunshot, and you're the only one in the room, they'll assume you did it. Obviously.
english.2733671881: If someone hears a gunshot, and you're in the room with a gun in your hand, they'll assume you did it. Obviously.
english.1237794506: If someone hears a gunshot, and you're in the room standing next to a corpse, they'll assume you did it. Obviously.
english.2037552605: Talking to NPCs might reveal murder opportunities. This works in real life too!
english.67212165: Once you know about a Mission Story, the game won't force you to find it again. Not sure why you'd want to replay one though.
english.2870683059: If you're dressed as a server, you can serve. If you're dressed as an ICA agent, you can... age?
english.1076666032: Guards are easily distracted. Throw a brick or something.
english.2951673230: Doors can be opened by shooting quickly using the pause menu. This is called a mudshot, which is a very elegant name.
english.1592110595: Waiters are legally allowed to put poison in people's food. Works in real life too!
english.2972173629: Guards will force you to press W and sometimes A or D when punching them. This is extremely difficult to do.
english.2361143607: People don't use boxes for anything. Their exclusive purpose is for storing corpses.
english.1669224969: If you throw something, people will investigate. It doesn't need to be a coin. Coins are largely useless.
english.2286543114: If someone sees you throw a brick, they'll be annoyed at you for littering. This is perfectly logical.
english.1737198132: VIPs will be evacuated in the event of an emergency. Place a bomb at the evacuation point.
english.2237108557: People who see something will say something.
english.1788213875: Wear a clown suit and attack people with a fish. It's very funny and original.
english.3131919560: Being recorded by a security camera does not matter in the slightest.
english.484067196: Kill as many civilians as possible for the best score.
english.2674618819: The red cross in the reticle means you've severely injured someone. The Red Cross in real life means someone has been severely injured.
english.1890130685: Locations can have multiple exits. Obviously.
english.3721059944: Did you know that there are challenges in the game?
english.4204542984: If you have dots on your minimap, you should see your GP.
english.296453899: Did you know there's an options menu? IO doesn't!
english.4268354613: Punching someone in the face is loud. Punching someone in the back of the head is completely silent. This is logical.
english.1434567699: Something about save games and XP, I don't get paid enough for this
english.3967426555: Did you know that mastery exists?
english.2385048115: You can shoot the lock of a door to open it. This is completely legal and you should do it while others are watching.
english.4152511567: Walking in tall grass can cause a Pokemon to appear. Wait wrong game
english.109647810: Crowd NPCs will instantly know whenever you commit a crime and will be extremely scared. Real NPCs will not notice this.
english.3914038524: You cannot carry a briefcase while climbing with two hands. Obviously.
english.3570436342: Briefcases aren't just for decoration; you can put things in them too!
english.991093704: Water is a pretty bad conductor of electricity, but it's still better than air.
english.3492108491: The picture-in-picture view shows all the cool things that are happening, like uh the 70th body being found?
english.1072116725: If you explore a level, you can discover new things in the level. I'm talking to you as if you have an IQ of 20.
english.3711641740: Guards monitor cameras. They don't investigate when a camera is destroyed though. That was only in 2016.
english.855196594: Surveillance cameras have an extremely noticeable laser grid showing their monitored area, just like real life.
english.3654219953: If you don't play on Master mode, you are clearly a bad gamer.
english.906793871: NPCs can see through mirrors. 47 is unfortunately not a vampire.
english.3339175938: Guards have an infinite supply of flash grenades.
english.684041020: Sniper rifles are both suspicious and among us.
english.1193835568: The Camera is a severely underutilised game mechanic.
english.2833913614: Shortcut doors have an obnoxious orange outline, in case you couldn't see them otherwise.
english.2887763763: Keypads are extremely easy to find the answer to. Usually it's written down in an extremely obvious place nearby.
english.1321458762: What the fuck is a Melon Man and how is that a playstyle
